trans-unit.source: Add Network Security Group to Role
trans-unit.target: Add Network Security Group to Role

trans-unit.source: The Add Network Security Group to Role operation associates the Network Security Group with the selected role.
trans-unit.target: The Add Network Security Group to Role operation associates the Network Security Group with the selected role.

trans-unit.source: The Add Network Security Group to Role request is specified as follows.
trans-unit.target: The Add Network Security Group to Role request is specified as follows.

trans-unit.source: Replace <subscription-id> with your subscription ID, <cloud-service-name> with the name of the cloud service, <deployment-name> with the name of the deployment, and <role-name> with the name of the Virtual Machine on which association will be added.
trans-unit.target: Replace <subscription-id> with your subscription ID, <cloud-service-name> with the name of the cloud service, <deployment-name> with the name of the deployment, and <role-name> with the name of the Virtual Machine on which association will be added.

trans-unit.source: You must make sure that the request that is made to the management service is secure.
trans-unit.target: You must make sure that the request that is made to the management service is secure.

trans-unit.source: For additional details, see HYPERLINK "file:///C:\\Users\\v-johida\\Desktop\\RDFE51Updates.doc" \l "z1becb7dc1cdc4db48ae87e351c96c251" Authenticating Service Management Requests.
trans-unit.target: For additional details, see HYPERLINK "file:///C:\\Users\\v-johida\\Desktop\\RDFE51Updates.doc" \l "z1becb7dc1cdc4db48ae87e351c96c251" Authenticating Service Management Requests.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the request headers.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the request headers.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.

trans-unit.source: The value of this header must be set to 2015-04-01 or higher.
trans-unit.target: The value of this header must be set to 2015-04-01 or higher.

trans-unit.source: For more information about versioning headers, see Service Management Versioning.
trans-unit.target: For more information about versioning headers, see Service Management Versioning.

trans-unit.source: The format of the request body is as follows:
trans-unit.target: The format of the request body is as follows:

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the Network Security Group that will be associated with selected Virtual Machine.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the name of the Network Security Group that will be associated with selected Virtual Machine.

trans-unit.source: The response includes an HTTP status code, a set of response headers, and a response body.
trans-unit.target: The response includes an HTTP status code, a set of response headers, and a response body.

trans-unit.source: A successful operation returns status code 202 (Accepted).
trans-unit.target: A successful operation returns status code 202 (Accepted).

trans-unit.source: For information about status codes, see HYPERLINK "file:///C:\\Users\\v-johida\\Desktop\\RDFE51Updates.doc" \l "z10f8d24446494063b6c97a20765513fa" Service Management Status and Error Codes.
trans-unit.target: For information about status codes, see HYPERLINK "file:///C:\\Users\\v-johida\\Desktop\\RDFE51Updates.doc" \l "z10f8d24446494063b6c97a20765513fa" Service Management Status and Error Codes.

trans-unit.source: The response for this operation includes the following headers.
trans-unit.target: The response for this operation includes the following headers.

trans-unit.source: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.

trans-unit.source: All standard headers conform to the HYPERLINK "http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478" HTTP/1.1 protocol specification.
trans-unit.target: All standard headers conform to the HYPERLINK "http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478" HTTP/1.1 protocol specification.

trans-unit.source: A value that uniquely identifies a request made against the management service.
trans-unit.target: A value that uniquely identifies a request made against the management service.
